    public class SmsSingletonProvider
extends SmsResourceProvider
    A CREST singleton provider for SMS schema config.

      • getServiceConfigNode

        protected ServiceConfig getServiceConfigNode​(org.forgerock.services.context.Context serverContext,
                                             String resourceId)
                                      throws SSOException,
                                             SMSException,
                                             org.forgerock.json.resource.NotFoundException
        Gets the referenced ServiceConfig for the current request.
        Parameters:
        serverContext - The request context.
        resourceId - The name of the config. If this is root Schema config, this will be null. Otherwise, it will be the name of the schema type.
        Returns:
        The instance retrieved from the service manager layer.
        Throws:
        SMSException - From downstream service manager layer.
        SSOException - From downstream service manager layer.
        org.forgerock.json.resource.NotFoundException - If the config being addressed doesn't exist.

      • getGlobalConfigNode

        protected ServiceConfig getGlobalConfigNode​(ServiceConfigManager scm,
                                            String resourceId)
                                     throws SSOException,
                                            SMSException,
                                            org.forgerock.json.resource.NotFoundException
        Gets the referenced global ServiceConfig for the current request.
        Parameters:
        scm - The ServerConfigManager instance.
        resourceId - The name of the config. If this is root Schema config, this will be null. Otherwise, it will be the name of the schema type.
        Returns:
        The global instance retrieved from the service manager layer.
        Throws:
        SMSException - From downstream service manager layer.
        SSOException - From downstream service manager layer.
        org.forgerock.json.resource.NotFoundException - If the config being addressed doesn't exist.
